data.name: Mixture
data.description:
Mixture is a fantasy action-adventure in which two enemies in an alliance of necessity traverse barren worlds in a quest for redemption. In this dual character control game, you alternate between playing as the master alchemist Sephairos and exiled knight Sola, in both first and third person perspectives. ğŸ§™â€â™‚ï¸ğŸ¦‹ As an odd couple, you must platform, mix materials, cast and melee, solve puzzles, and defeat giant bosses to survive this atmospheric tale!

Mixtures main features:

Mix and Slash  ğŸ§ªâ›ï¸  - action adventure gameplay combining the two characters unique skills

Dual character control ğŸ§™â€â™‚ï¸ğŸ¦‹  - control both the Alchemist Sephairos and the Steel Moth Knight Sola 

Explore the Wastelands  ğŸ—ºï¸  - journey through hand crafted dangerous barren lands of living metals, ores and crystals 

Fight for the light  âœ¨ - Oversized bosses to defeat on your path of redemption

Hours of exploration  â³ğŸŒ  - Four unique biomes and more than 30 levels

An action adventure for standalone VR  ğŸ¥½  - Hybrid third person camera and fixed camera movement for hours of comfortable exploration in the Wastelands.

changelog.change_log:
Changes:
1. Gameplay
Added new particle on Sola to show dash ability cooldown and reset
Added specific locations where itâ€™s easier to get Sola react to players touch:
Mortars, Laboratory, Deep Wild, Skyward Paths, Crossroads, Riddle Dark, Aqueduct, Dam & Pier and Canyon
Added better logic at the end of Aqueduct (rescuing Zep from the rust)
Automatic checkpoint after connecting the second crystal in Crown Riddle level
Fixed general issue with magnets being active despite objects blocking their flow
Fixed rusted walls positions in Idol Up, that could cause Sola to die in a safe spot
Fixed issue with lost input in Crater
Fixed issue with lost input during climbing in Idol Down
Nerfed specific jumppad in Crossroads, that propelled Sola to high

2. Player Guidance
Added guiding light effect at the end of Prison level
Tweaked crackwalls and resources positions in Pier Boss to make the winning strategy more clear
